actions.text: Called up by House Under Suspension of Rules.
Failed to Receive 2/3's Vote to Suspend and Pass by Yea-Nay Vote: 220 - 160 (Record Vote No: 456).

official_title: A resolution to provide for the concurrence in the senate amendments to H.R. 6027, with an amendment.

summary.text: Provides for the concurrence in the Senate amendment to H.R. 6027 (local government antitrust liability) with an amendment.

titles.title: A resolution to provide for the concurrence in the senate amendments to H.R. 6027, with an amendment.
